mention.text: Iraqi Ambassador to Russia Shafiq Muhsin , who is staying in Nizhny Novgorod
Iraq other Russian companies as well
a very good occasion to invite to Iraq other Russian companies as well
the automobile industry , namely manufacturing of automobiles and their components
manufacturing of automobiles and their components
